articles.title: Rochester City Council Votes on Controversial 2025 Budget — What It Means for You
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.dek: A $600 million spending plan passed late Tuesday, bringing cuts to parks, more funding for policing, and a proposed 3.2% property tax increase that has divided the city.
